diànfěn starch; amylum C6H10O5
yějīn metallurgy

traditional: 冶煉
yěliàn to smelt metal

traditional: 濕潤
shīrùn moist

traditional: 尚書
shàngshū same as 書經|书经 Book of History; a high official in ancient China (esp. in combinations such as 戶部尚書|户部尚书)

traditional: 農奴
nóngnú serf

traditional: 供銷
gōngxiāo (v) supply and sell

traditional: 副產品
fùchǎnpǐn by-product
déyì proud of oneself; pleased with oneself; complacent
bùfú not accept sth; want to have sth overruled or changed; refuse to obey or comply; refuse to accept as final; remain unconvinced by; not give in to

traditional: 資產
zīchǎn property; assets

traditional: 說服
shuōfú to persuade; to convince; to talk sb over

traditional: 實物
shíwù material object; object for practical use; definite thing; reality; matter (phys.)

traditional: 區間
qūjiān interval (math.)
qiǎoqiǎo quietly
qiānwǎ (meas) kilowatt
qìaqìa exactly; just; precisely

traditional: 連同
liántóng together with; along with
jiědá answer; explanation; (math.) solution (of an equation)
